languages.text: {n}Несмотря на множество кровоточащих ран, статный {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g} спокойно расправляет плечи и приподнимает тонкий подбородок, изучая вас проницательным взглядом. В изумрудных глазах ксеноса сияют отблески загадочных синих огней.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Мон-кай{/g} спас{mf||ла} мне жизнь? Вселенная полна жестоких сюрпризов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Несмотря на множество кровоточащих ран, статный {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g} спокойно расправляет плечи и приподнимает тонкий подбородок, изучая вас проницательным взглядом. В изумрудных глазах ксеноса сияют отблески загадочных синих огней.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Мон-кай{/g} спас{mf||ла} мне жизнь? Вселенная полна жестоких сюрпризов".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на множество кровоточащих ран, статный {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g} спокойно расправляет плечи и приподнимает тонкий подбородок, изучая вас проницательным взглядом. В изумрудных глазах ксеноса сияют отблески загадочных синих огней.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Мон-кай{/g} спас{mf||ла} мне жизнь? Вселенная полна жестоких сюрпризов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his fine chin as he scrutinises you with his keen emerald-green eyes, in which mysterious blue lights are gleaming.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Aunque sangra por numerosas heridas, el majestuoso {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} se yergue con calma y levanta su estrecha barbilla para escudriñarte con su penetrante mirada. Sus ojos de color verde esmeralda emiten misteriosos destellos de luz azul.{/n} «¿{mf|Un|Una} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} me ha salvado la vida? El universo está lleno de sorpresas crueles».
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aunque sangra por numerosas heridas, el majestuoso {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} se yergue con calma y levanta su estrecha barbilla para escudriñarte con su penetrante mirada. Sus ojos de color verde esmeralda emiten misteriosos destellos de luz azul.{/n} «¿{mf|Un|Una} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} me ha salvado la vida? El universo está lleno de sorpresas crueles».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}体中から血を流しつつも、その風格ある{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}は静かに肩を正し、細いあごを上げ、鋭いまなざしであなたを見つめた。翠玉色の瞳に神秘的な青い光がきらめく。{/n} 「私の命を救ったのが{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}だと？宇宙は残酷な驚きに満ちているな」
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."

traits.locale_text: {n}体中から血を流しつつも、その風格ある{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}は静かに肩を正し、細いあごを上げ、鋭いまなざしであなたを見つめた。翠玉色の瞳に神秘的な青い光がきらめく。{/n} 「私の命を救ったのが{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}だと？宇宙は残酷な驚きに満ちているな」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}尽管这个面貌威严的{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}浑身布满了流血的伤口，但他仍然冷静地挺直了肩膀，抬起尖下巴，以敏锐的目光审视着你，翠绿色的眼睛里闪烁着神秘的蓝光。{/n}“是{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}救了我的命？宇宙真是充满了残酷的意外啊。”
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管这个面貌威严的{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}浑身布满了流血的伤口，但他仍然冷静地挺直了肩膀，抬起尖下巴，以敏锐的目光审视着你，翠绿色的眼睛里闪烁着神秘的蓝光。{/n}“是{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}救了我的命？宇宙真是充满了残酷的意外啊。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Malgré ses nombreuses plaies béantes, l'imposant {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} redresse calmement les épaules et lève son étroit menton pour vous lancer un regard aiguisé. De mystérieuses lueurs bleues animent ses yeux émeraude.{/n} « {mf|Un|Une} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} m'a sauvé la vie ? L'univers regorge de cruelles surprises. »
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré ses nombreuses plaies béantes, l'imposant {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} redresse calmement les épaules et lève son étroit menton pour vous lancer un regard aiguisé. De mystérieuses lueurs bleues animent ses yeux émeraude.{/n} « {mf|Un|Une} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} m'a sauvé la vie ? L'univers regorge de cruelles surprises. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Trotz seiner vielen blutenden Wunden richtet der stattliche {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} in Ruhe seine Schultern auf und mustert dich mit leicht erhobenem Kinn und klarem Blick. In seinen smaragdgrünen Augen schimmert ein geheimnisvolles blaues Licht.{/n} "{mf|Ein|Eine} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} hat mir das Leben gerettet? Das Universum steckt voller grausamer Überraschungen."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz seiner vielen blutenden Wunden richtet der stattliche {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} in Ruhe seine Schultern auf und mustert dich mit leicht erhobenem Kinn und klarem Blick. In seinen smaragdgrünen Augen schimmert ein geheimnisvolles blaues Licht.{/n} "{mf|Ein|Eine} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} hat mir das Leben gerettet? Das Universum steckt voller grausamer Überraschungen."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Gösterişli {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, kanayıp duran yaralarına rağmen sakince dikleşiyor. Zeki bakışlarıyla seni incelerken dar çenesini kaldırıyor. Zümrüt yeşili gözlerinde esrarengiz mavi ışıklar parıldıyor.{/n} "Canımı bir {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} mi kurtardı? Evren, gaddar sürprizlerle dolu."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} saved my life? The universe is full of cruel surprises."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gösterişli {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, kanayıp duran yaralarına rağmen sakince dikleşiyor. Zeki bakışlarıyla seni incelerken dar çenesini kaldırıyor. Zümrüt yeşili gözlerinde esrarengiz mavi ışıklar parıldıyor.{/n} "Hayatımı bir {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} mi kurtardı? Evren gaddar sürprizlerle dolu."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
